Start off with the parameterisation 

\begin{align*}
\binom{x+r-1}{x} &= {\frac {(x+r-1)(x+r-2)\dotsm (r)}{x!}} = {\frac {\Gamma(x+r)}{x!\,\Gamma (r)}}
\end{align*}
